tool_config.description: A comprehensive DOCX document parser that extracts metadata, splits content by sections, caches content locally, supports content retrieval by page number or section title, and processes embedded images with base64 encoding or file path options.

tools.description: Parses a DOCX document and extracts metadata including page count, character count, section information, and images. The document content is split by sections and cached locally for subsequent retrieval.

input_parameters.name: doc_path
input_parameters.description: Path to the DOCX document file to be parsed

input_parameters.name: job_id
input_parameters.description: Optional job ID for this parsing task. If not provided, a UUID will be automatically generated

output_parameters.description: JSON string containing parsing status, job_id, document metadata (page_count, char_count, section_count, image_count), sections list with titles and levels, and images list with IDs and filenames

tools.description: Retrieves the content of a specific page from a previously parsed document, including text paragraphs, headings, and associated section information.

input_parameters.name: job_id
input_parameters.description: Job ID returned from parse_document function

output_parameters.description: JSON string containing retrieval status, job_id, page number, content array with paragraphs and their metadata (text, type, is_heading, heading_level), and sections array showing which sections appear on this page

tools.description: Retrieves all content from a specific section identified by its title, including text paragraphs, headings, and associated images.

input_parameters.name: job_id
input_parameters.description: Job ID returned from parse_document function

input_parameters.name: section_title
input_parameters.description: Exact title of the section to retrieve

output_parameters.description: JSON string containing retrieval status, job_id, section metadata (id, title, level), content array with all paragraphs in the section, and images array with image IDs and filenames

tools.description: Retrieves a specific image from a parsed document, with options to return either base64-encoded data or file path.

input_parameters.name: job_id
input_parameters.description: Job ID returned from parse_document function

input_parameters.name: image_id
input_parameters.description: Image ID (e.g., 'image_001') from the images list returned by parse_document

input_parameters.name: return_type
input_parameters.description: Return format: 'base64' for base64-encoded image data, or 'path' for file system path

output_parameters.description: JSON string containing retrieval status, job_id, image_id, return_type, and either 'data' (base64 string) or 'path' (file path string), plus image format information

tools.description: Removes all cached files associated with a specific job, including metadata, section content, and extracted images.

input_parameters.name: job_id
input_parameters.description: Job ID of the cache to be cleaned

output_parameters.description: JSON string containing operation status and confirmation message
